---
title: "package.json"
---

## High-level description
This is the `package.json` file for the "once" npm package. It defines the package's metadata, dependencies, and configuration for a Node.js module that provides functionality to run a function exactly one time.

## Symbols

### Package Metadata
#### Description
The package metadata includes essential information about the "once" package.

| Field | Value | Description |
|:------|:------|:------------|
| name | "once" | The name of the package |
| version | "1.4.0" | The current version of the package |
| description | "Run a function exactly one time" | A brief description of the package's functionality |
| main | "once.js" | The main entry point of the package |
| author | "Isaac Z. Schlueter &lt;i@izs.me&gt; (http://blog.izs.me/)" | The author of the package |
| license | "ISC" | The license under which the package is distributed |

### Dependencies
#### Description
The package has one runtime dependency and one development dependency.

| Dependency | Version | Type |
|:-----------|:--------|:-----|
| wrappy | "1" | Runtime dependency |
| tap | "^7.0.1" | Development dependency |

### Scripts
#### Description
Defines the available npm scripts for the package.

| Script | Command | Description |
|:-------|:--------|:------------|
| test | "tap test/*.js" | Runs the test suite using the 'tap' testing framework |

### Repository
#### Description
Specifies the version control repository for the package.

| Field | Value | Description |
|:------|:------|:------------|
| type | "git" | The type of version control system |
| url | "git://github.com/isaacs/once" | The URL of the Git repository |

### Files
#### Description
Specifies the files to be included when the package is published.

| Files |
|:------|
| "once.js" |

### Keywords
#### Description
Keywords associated with the package for better discoverability.

| Keywords |
|:---------|
| "once" |
| "function" |
| "one" |
| "single" |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| wrappy | Runtime dependency, likely used in the implementation of the "once" functionality |
| tap | Development dependency used for running tests |

This `package.json` file provides all the necessary metadata and configuration for the "once" npm package, which is designed to run a function exactly one time. It includes information about dependencies, testing setup, and package distribution details.
